name: Reds Tale
description:
A small girl finds herself in a cave, she finds out she must reach the underworld to return to the surface.

Progression

As you progress in your quest toward the underworld, you will have many platforming challenges. In total there are 3 biomes you will adventure through. Throughout the levels, you will find chests that contain collectables!

Speed Running

Go into settings to turn on the speed run timer. Your run will be saved, when you finish the game if it beats your previous time. Post your best times!

(The speed run timer is recommended to be enabled AFTER you complete your first play through)

DEVELOPERS

Music Composer | Dirk J. Neefs

Programming, Art & Sound FX  | Finn McGuire

Game Engine: Godot 3.0

ASSETS USED:

Platform Character Pack | By: Thomas Lean
